text: sillo geudeul-i chubangdoendaedo geudeul(wiseonjadeul)eun geudeul(yudaeindeul)gwa hamkke nagaji anh-eul geos-imyeo, sillo nugungaga geudeul-eul gong-gyeoghae ondaedo geudeul-eun geudeul-eul dobji anh-eul geos-ila. sillo geudeul-i geudeul-eul dobneundaedo geudeul(wiseonjadeul)eun jeongnyeongko kkongmunileul ppael geos-imyeo geuleon hu geudeul(wiseonjadeul)eun doum-eul badji moshal geos-ila
